remarks: Locatedness of multiplication on positive reals.  Lemma 12.9 in [BauerTaylor], p. 56 (but where both ` A ` and ` B ` are positive, not just ` A ` ).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
mullocpr $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> A. q e. Q. A. r e. Q. ( q <Q r -> ( q e. ( 1st ` ( A .P. B ) ) \/ r e. ( 2nd ` ( A .P. B ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A q r $.
$d B q r $.
